SELECT a.cityCode , a.gunCode , a.dongCode, a.cityN , a.gunN , a.dongN , IFNULL(tem.cityCount,0) as cityCount
FROM address_code AS a LEFT JOIN
( select tem.* from ( select count(a.cityCode) as cityCount ,a.cityCode from web_member AS a group by a.cityCode ) as tem ) as tem
ON a.cityCode = tem.cityCode
where 1=1
GROUP BY a.cityCode order by FIELD(cityN,'서울특별시') desc , cityN asc
SELECT case WHEN count(a.cityCode) >= 1 THEN a.cityCode WHEN count(a.cityCode) = 0 THEN '0' END FROM address_code AS a where 1=1 and a.cityN = #{cityN}
SELECT case WHEN count(a.gunCode) >= 1 THEN a.gunCode WHEN count(a.gunCode) = 0 THEN '0' END FROM address_code AS a where 1=1 and a.gunN = #{gunN}
SELECT case WHEN count(a.dongCode) >= 1 THEN a.dongCode WHEN count(a.dongCode) = 0 THEN '0' END FROM address_code AS a where 1=1 and a.dongN = #{dongN}

select
ifnull(sum(if(date_format(now(),'%Y') - substring(yyyymmdd,1,4) between 20 and 29 , 1, 0)),0) as age_20, ifnull(sum(if(date_format(now(),'%Y') - substring(yyyymmdd,1,4) between 30 and 39 , 1, 0)),0) as age_30, ifnull(sum(if(date_format(now(),'%Y') - substring(yyyymmdd,1,4) between 40 and 49 , 1, 0)),0) as age_40, ifnull(sum(if(date_format(now(),'%Y') - substring(yyyymmdd,1,4) between 50 and 59 , 1, 0)),0) as age_50, ifnull(sum(if(date_format(now(),'%Y') - substring(yyyymmdd,1,4) between 60 and 69 , 1, 0)),0) as age_60
from web_member
where 1=1
and cityCode = #{cityCode}
and regDt is not null
and regDt >= #{startDate} and regDt <= #{endDate}

SELECT FINAL.* FROM (
SELECT a.cityCode , a.gunCode , a.dongCode, a.cityN , a.gunN , a.dongN , IFNULL(tem.cityCount,0) as cityCount
FROM address_code AS a LEFT JOIN
( select tem.* from ( select count(a.cityCode) as cityCount ,a.cityCode from web_member AS a where 1=1 and regDt is not null
and regDt >= #{startDate} and regDt <= #{endDate}
group by a.cityCode ) as tem ) as tem
ON a.cityCode = tem.cityCode
where 1=1
GROUP BY a.cityCode order by cityN asc
) FINAL
